summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll for Phase "A", Local Improvement District No. 6574 for the improvement of PERKINS LANE WEST from approximately 300 feet southeasterly of the production northeasterly of West Smith Street to approximately 500 feet southeasterly of said produced street; and from approximately 20 feet northwesterly of West McGraw Street to approximately 350 feet southeasterly of West McGraw Street; and a certain other street and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same.
